Django PRBAC
============

(Parameterized Role-Based Access Control)

https://github.com/dimagi/django-prbac

|Build Status| |Test coverage| |PyPi version| |PyPi downloads|

Quick Start
-----------

To install, use pip:

::

    $ pip install django-prbac
